about_the_game:
Shrouded Aspect is the first installment in "The Pantheon Cycle".

A plague is sweeping across the land. It could be a sign that the old gods are returning, and Despater - the god of death, is already wreaking havoc. Travel throughout the land with Betha and local volunteers from each region to find and destroy the source of the plague.

An epic story unfolds in a medieval Celtic fantasy world. Branching story paths, and tough choices about who to take with you and who to leave behind will ensure replayability of the 32 scenarios.

  • Focus on tactical combat

  • Turn-based

  • Single-player

  • Story-driven campaign

  • Squad-level tactical strategy

  • Recruit new party members along your journey

  • Skill and equipment-based character progression
